content.question: A polynomial p(x) has a relative maximum at (-2,4) , a relative minimum at (1,1) , a relative maximum at (5, 7) and no other critical points. How many zeros does p(x) have?

topic.text: 1.16: Working with the Intermediate Value Theorem (IVT)

skill.text: Skill 3.A: Apply technology to develop claims and conjectures.
